introDesc: I build scalable, efficient, and user-friendly digital solutions end to end.
aboutLine1: Back in 2019, I decided after ending my 5 years military contract to jump in that rabbit hole of coding and web development.
aboutLine2: My journey in tech began as a junior front-end developer at
aboutLine3: in Phuket, Thailand. Over three years, I worked on a wide range of web development projects. My career took a major turn when I rebuilt
aboutLine4: , transitioning from web development to mobile development.
aboutLine5: Currently, I work full time for
aboutLine6: based in Bangkok in full remote, where I initially developed a fitness mobile application from the ground up. Today, I oversee the entire development process, including backend, frontend, and DevOps..
aboutLine7: In my free time, I enjoy running, lifting, swimming, and diving into side projects to fuel my passion for coding.
